info.name: Flight Rising: Show Awakened Familiars
info.description: *#* OUTDATED: No longer updating or adding in familiars *#* Slightly fades and adds a border around awakened familiars. User must manually add their awakened familiars to the CSS for it to work. There's a google spreadsheet up here to help create the codes. Make sure to back up your list of awakened familiars. Just in case this thing clears itself for some reason.
